required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Survey of People With Diabetes, Caregivers of People With Diabetes Parents of Children and Young People With Diabetes

brief_summary.textblock: A survey of people with diabetes and caregivers of people with diabetes and parents of children and young people with diabetes in Denmark in order to assess perceived diabetes related health and wellbeing and perceived access to and gaps in medical care, support and other financial and support services.

detailed_description.textblock: A questionnaire survey was designed for online completion by people with diabetes and caregivers of people with diabetes and parents of children and young people with diabetes in Denmark in order to assess their perceived diabetes related health and wellbeing and perceived access to and gaps in medical care, support and other financial and support services. The aim is for the survey to provide a cross-sectional assessment of present access to health, wellbeing and care for people with diabetes and caregivers in Denmark and to establish a survey tool suitable for ongoing long-term monitoring of well-being, care and support to people with diabetes and caregivers in Denmark.

primary_outcome.measure: Diabetes membership survey of health, access to care, support and services
primary_outcome.time_frame: The survey was administered from April 11 to 29th 2019
primary_outcome.description: Study-specific Likert-scale single item variables for perceived health, access to diabetes care, support and services (1-5)

arm_group.description: Adults with type 1 and type 2 diabetes and caregivers of people with diabetes including parents of children and young people with diabetes.

study_pop.textblock: Adults with type 1 and type 2 diabetes, caregivers of people with diabetes and parents of children and young people with diabetes. Primary survey population are members of the national diabetes association.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age over 18
Exclusion Criteria:
- Not able to complete online questionnaire
